name: Centripetal Chaos
description:
WASD or arrow keys to move, R to reset level.  Moving right makes the game rotate clockwise, left makes it rotate the other way.  You control both the character and the rotation simultaneously.

I did a brief browser test; it seems laggy in Firefox, but works fine in Chrome and Edge.

Made in 48 hours for the 2020 GMTK game jam.  The theme was "Out of Control".  In this case, your character wildly gets out of control the more that gravity accelerates.

The game is made in Javascript.  Music made in KORG gadget for Nintendo Switch, sound effects made in FamiTracker.  Graphics are made in clay, of which the clay I owned because of the revamp I made of my last year's game after the jam period ended (which I should really get around to completely finishing one of these days).
